product_title: LLOYD 5 in 1 Convertible 1.25 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC with 4 way Swing (Copper Condenser, GLS15I3FWSEV)
overview_text:
High Performance
Offering an airflow volume of up to 640CFM, the LLOYD GLS15I3FWSEV 1.25-Ton Split Air Conditioner is a good option for cooling rooms as large as 150Sq.Ft. Moreover, this AC's four-way swing circulates cool air throughout the entire room efficiently by employing both horizontal and vertical louvres, ensuring an even and comfortable distribution of temperature. 
Turbo Cooling
With its rapid cooling capabilities powered by the Turbo Cooling technology, this split air conditioner swiftly brings down the temperature in your room, making it a great choice for scorching summer days. Following an intense day of outdoor activities, this AC offers immediate relief by cooling down your living space within no time.
5-in-1 Convertible Mode
You can tailor your cooling experience with this AC's 5-in-1 convertible mode, which allows you to customise the cooling capacity for maximum comfort and high energy efficiency.
Rotary Compressor
This 1.25-ton AC is equipped with a robust rotary compressor for high cooling performance and long-term durability.
3-Star AC
Designed with your budget in mind, this air conditioner features a 3-star rating and consumes as little as 1485W, providing energy-efficient cooling to keep your costs down.
Copper Condenser Coil
This Lloyd air conditioner features a copper condenser coil, ensuring high heat exchange efficiency for optimal and rapid cooling.
PM2.5 Dust Filter with Activated Carbon
Fitted with an efficient PM2.5 dust filter with activated carbon, this AC plays a vital role in removing dust, allergens, and airborne impurities to maintain good air quality.
R32 Refrigerant
Utilising R32 refrigerant, this air conditioner is engineered to deliver both efficient and environment-friendly cooling solutions.
Clean Filter Indication
The AC has a clever feature called the clean filter indication.  When it is time to clean the indoor unit’s air filter, the display panel shows a ‘CL’ symbol, giving you a clear signal to do so.
Stabiliser-Free Operation
Thanks to its stabiliser-free operation, this air conditioner operates smoothly even in case of voltage fluctuations.
Inverter-Compatible
This air conditioner stays functional even in the event of power outages thanks to its compatibility with various inverters.
key_features: 1.25 Ton Inverter Split AC, 3 Star Rating
1 Year Comprehensive Warranty, 10 Years Compressor Warranty
